) } export async function getStaticProps(ctx) { const res = await fetch(`http://localhost:3001/activity/${ctx.params.id}`) const json = await res.json(); return { data: json, req: ctx } // By returning { props: posts }, the Blog component // will receive `posts` as a prop at build time return { props: { posts, }, } }
